# pipefy_phase (Resource)

Phase resource



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the phase
- `pipe_id` (String) The ID of the pipe that the phase belongs to

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of the phase
